effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.black-white: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.black-white: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
